title: Issue #35 EventBus Sync Fix
details:
Cross-tab Quick Tab sync uses storage.onChanged exclusively (v1.6.2+). The event flow is:

1. StorageManager._onStorageChanged() - detects browser storage.onChanged event
2. StorageManager.scheduleStorageSync() - debounces and emits 'storage:changed' on EventBus
3. SyncCoordinator.handleStorageChange() - receives event, extracts Quick Tabs
4. StateManager.hydrate() - emits state:added/updated/deleted events
5. UICoordinator - listens to state events, renders Quick Tabs

CRITICAL: All components (StorageManager, SyncCoordinator, StateManager, UICoordinator) MUST share the same EventBus instance (internalEventBus from QuickTabsManager).

To verify event flow, check logs for:
- [StorageManager] listenerCount should be 1+
- [SyncCoordinator] *** RECEIVED storage:changed EVENT ***
- [StateManager] âœ“ Hydrate complete

If listenerCount is 0, EventBus instances don't match.
